name: Music Notes
poem: The spotlight comes on, and Cybot sings you a song.

name: Absorb
poem: Balls of energy sneak away MP.
effect: Absorbs (about) 10% of a character's max MP.

name: Active Life
poem: When you think you will win, the tables will turn, enemies can come back, a lesson you must learn.

name: Amplifire
poem: Pink ray of light (to Guardian's delight).

name: Area Bomb
poem: Atropos explodes, and Robo's HP erodes.

name: Arm Attack
poem: You'll be grabbed by the hand, and your body will be slammed.

name: Azala Break
poem: The ground will surely quake, with Azala's famed Azala Break.
effect: Physical damage and causes HP to steadily drop for all characters.

name: Bad Impulse
used_by: Flea Plus (with Great Ozzie and Super Slash)
poem: Slash will jump off Ozzie's head, and deliver a fire attack that you'll dread.

name: Barrier Change
poem: Magus will change his weakness, it's true, so you'll have to change your attack too.
effect: Magus changes his weakness to the same element as his last magic attack.
